Savant 1.0.1 Description

SAVANT is a 2D word/puzzle game modeled after PopCap's Bookworm. Connect letters to form words and gain points. Longer words = more points.

Controls
  • Left-Click/Touch to select and deselect tiles
  • ESC to exit the game
Known Bugs/Issues
  • when down to one tile, you must click a second tile in proximity to enable the ability to deselect all tiles
